It captures the key distinguishing feature: optimization and relevance-based selection vs arbitrary/random selection. This opposition is more useful for Fisher-LDA steering than pure ontological opposites (Process vs Entity) because it maintains domain relevance while maximizing conceptual distance along the meaningful axis of 'search quality/optimization'.
